title: If it’s M.I.C.E Travel, then we’ve got all it at MICEkart.com - MiceKart Blogs

headings.text: If it’s M.I.C.E Travel, then we’ve got all it at MICEkart.com

paragraphs: MICEkart.com is the only online marketplace solution which deals in MICE products & services. The idea is to create value for buyers & sellers of MICE products & services by offering them a unique platform to optimally buy and sell MICE products & services, thus bridging the gap between MICE solution providers & Clients across the country.

MICEkart.com has been ideated & developed by Gavin D’Costa and Abhishek Gupta, who are also the Co-founders of Trip Navigator Pvt Ltd, a company providing exceptional MICE services for corporates across various sectors.

MICEkart.com has been created keeping in mind that the MICE industry needs to evolve, and buyers & sellers are thus able to optimally buy or sell products or services with value creation being the main objective.

MICEkart.com is currently the only platform where you get access to the best deals available in the world of MICE ranging from Hotel bookings for Conferences, Merchandise options, Team building activities, Event solutions & set-ups, Artist management solutions, MICE packages & lots more.. “It’s your ONE-STOP- SHOP for everything in M.I.C.E”
The MICEkart.com systems use Block Armour’s Secure Shield for next-gen Zero Trust security as well as to meet GDPR / data protection and privacy compliance.
MICE companies in Bangalore|MICE companies in Delhi|MICE Companies in Gurgaon|MICE companies in Hyderabad|MICE Companies in Mumbai

items: Listing deals – To benefit partners generate incremental sales & clients get access to better deals.
Advanced search mechanism to enable effective planning for clients.
Easy to use platform with wide range of options to choose from.
Reduced costs as a result of much lower commissions due to higher volumes of business.
Infinitely scalable – As a result of smart tech solutions.
Unique tech features like Mobile App for quick response time.
Why Digital MICE Platforms Are the Future
5 Proven Ways to Increase Leads for Your Team Building Company
How MICE Services Elevate Corporate Travel & Incentive Programs
Conference Planning Made Easy: End-to-End Event Solutions for Businesses
Why Professional Hotel and Venue Management is Crucial for Corporate Events
